RESPONSE TEXT: Best part of Diamond City is honestly the lights. Can spot those bad boys for miles.
Ever seen a Mirelurk? Think a crab, crossed with a tank, with a bad hangover.
You run into Feral Ghouls, keep your distance. Mindless eating machines. They'll always come straight for ya.
A Deathclaw is where the real danger is. Don't try to outrun it. Just get something solid between you and it. Then... pray.
